description: Specifies the margin properties for the object.

topInset.title: Top Inset of the margin
topInset.description: Specifies the top inset margin for the text edit.

leftInset.title: Left Inset of the margin
leftInset.description: Specifies the left inset margin for the text edit.

rightInset.title: Right Inset of the margin
rightInset.description: Specifies the right inset margin for the text edit.

bottomInset.title: Bottom Inset of the margin
bottomInset.description: Specifies the bottom inset margin for the text edit.
